metadata.title: CVE-2024-1548 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A website could have obscured the fullscreen notification by using adropdown select input element. This could have led to user confusion andpossible spoofing attacks. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 123,Firefox ESR < 115.8, and Thunderbird < 115.8.

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs78 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs91 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs102 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
